    <div class="section-wrapper-content-wrapper">
      <div class="content-border pager-offset"><h2 class = "black-bar-header">Notícias Mais Recentes</h2><div class="view view-news-recent view-id-news_recent view-display-id-teaser view-dom-id-8b9595fb5682dc6e0c9e432e9eb9c389">
        
  
  
      
<div class="panelizer-view-mode node node-teaser node-article node-76690">
        <div class="white-stone"><div class="white-stone-content"><div class="gs-container" >
  <div class="default-1-3"><div class="simple-border"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/keyd-stars-constelacao-que-brilhou-mais-forte" title="Keyd Stars: A constelação que brilhou mais forte" class="lol-core-file-formatter"><div class="field field-name-field-article-media field-type-file field-label-hidden"><div id="file-35783" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">

  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/nova-onda-de-ingressos-e-calendario-do-msi-2017">Nova onda de ingressos e calendário do MSI 2017</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Ainda temos ingressos para a Fase de Grupos do MSI 2017, no Rio de Janeiro, disponíveis, mas liberaremos uma nova onda junto com o calendário da etapa.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76611">1 day ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>

</div></a></div></div></div>
  <div class="default-2-3"><h4><a href="/pt/news/esports/esports-editorial/dos-mantos-vermelhos-apenas-um-em-recife">Dos mantos vermelhos, apenas um em Recife</a></h4><div class="teaser-content"><div class="field field-name-field-body-medium field-type-text-long field-label-hidden">Final antecipada entre Red Canids e paiN Gaming promete muita emoção. A Matilha enfrenta o arsenal vasto da paiN Gaming. A expectativa é para uma série longa e disputada até o último jogo, mas apenas uma camisa rubro-negra será vista em Recife.</div></div><div class="horizontal-group"><div class="horizontal-group-item"><div class="all-caps subtle icon-container icon-posted"><span class="time-ago time-ago-node-76520">2 days ago</span></div></div><div class="clearfix"></div></div></div>
</div>

            >
                
                               
                                            
    

                    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-slideshow size-wide"
            >
                
        <div
            class="image-container"
            style="max-width: 2040px;"
            data-images="[{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2016\/12\/LOL_CMS_29_image-1.jpg&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2016\/12\/LOL_CMS_29_image-1.jpg&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;Elementalist Lux Login: Water Form&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:2040,&quot;height&quot;:1258},{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2016\/12\/LOL_CMS_29_image-3.jpg&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2016\/12\/LOL_CMS_29_image-3.jpg&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;Elementalist Lux&#039;s Light Form: Work-In-Progress&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:334,&quot;height&quot;:1251},{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2016\/12\/layers_v3.gif&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2016\/12\/layers_v3.gif&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;Here&#039;s a handful of the many layers that exist within Lux&#039;s light form... and then there&#039;s that&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:400,&quot;height&quot;:700}]"
        >
            <div
                class="inner"
                style="padding-top: 61.667%;"
            >
                <button
                    type="button"
                    class="image-action action-open-slideshow"
                >
                    <img
                        class="image"
                        src="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/LOL_CMS_29_image-1.jpg"
                        alt="Elementalist Lux Login: Water Form"
                    />
                </button>

                                <div class="border"></div>
                            </div>
        </div>

                    <div class="caption">Elementalist Lux Login: Water Form</div>
        
                    <div class="action">
                <button type="button" class="action-open-slideshow">
                    <span class="text">View All 3 Images</span>
                </button>
            </div>
            
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html-slideshow-split"
            >
                <div class="inner align-left">

            <div class="part html">
                    
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p>Elementalist Luxs story is one of internal struggle, and each of her ten forms was deliberately crafted to embody a particular emotion. Trying to capture the subtlety of sentiments in a typical login animation presented a challenge. In past login screens, champs were often portrayed from a distance, making it difficult to read their facial expressions. To better communicate <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fjrfYZsZLJA&amp;t=38s" target="_blank">Luxs emotional journey</a>, artists created Leagues first portrait-style login animation.</p>
<h2>WAIT, IS THAT LUX?</h2>
<p>When looking at a champs silhouette, there are visual clues that help distinguish one from the other. An oversized pair of gauntlets lets you spot the Piltover Enforcer at a distance, just as a lamp post indicates youre looking at someone who lacks a real weapon. Without these iconic characteristics, it might be difficult to differentiate, say, Poppy from Tristana at first glance.</p>
<p> Artist Suke hugehugesword set out to capture <a href="http://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/lux" target="_blank">Luxs essence</a> in a still-frame without relying on her complete figure or iconic wandcore components of her recognizable silhouette. After creating an rough version, he approached other Rioters with a question: Does this look like a League of Legends champion, and if so, who?</p>
<p>For the first few rounds of drawings, people sporadically identified the Demacian mage, but many felt she was missing what made Lux feel like Lux: a bubbly, amicable persona.</p>

    
    </div>


            </div>

            <div class="part slideshow">
                <div class="inner" style="width: 334px">
                        
                    
    

        
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-slideshow size-wide"
            >
                
        <div
            class="image-container"
            style="max-width: 334px;"
            data-images="[{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2016\/12\/LOL_CMS_29_image-3.jpg&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2016\/12\/LOL_CMS_29_image-3.jpg&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;Elementalist Lux&#039;s Light Form: Work-In-Progress&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:334,&quot;height&quot;:1251}]"
        >
            <div
                class="inner"
                style="padding-top: 374.551%;"
            >
                <button
                    type="button"
                    class="image-action action-open-slideshow"
                >
                    <img
                        class="image"
                        src="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/LOL_CMS_29_image-3.jpg"
                        alt="Elementalist Lux's Light Form: Work-In-Progress"
                    />
                </button>

                            </div>
        </div>

                    <div class="caption">Elementalist Lux's Light Form: Work-In-Progress</div>
        
            
    </div>


                </div>
            </div>

        </div>
    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p>Armed with this feedback, Suke revisited the artwork, highlighting the lights in her eyes and the smile on her face. When he showed people the new drawings, they saw more than a just beautiful face. They saw Lux.</p>
<p>In each image of Elementalist Lux, Suke wanted to portray a specific feeling. Her light form is an embodiment of hope, seen in the brightness in her eyes and light dancing on her face. Fire was built on fury, with dramatic, contrasting colors in her hair and an angular face shape to subconsciously convey harshness. Tranquility guided water form, seen in Luxs restful expression and the cool, calming color scheme.</p>

    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html-slideshow-split"
            >
                <div class="inner align-right">

            <div class="part html">
                    
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><em>When an illustration is finished, its split into layers that motion graphics artist can individually control. For example, Luxs hair can catch in a breeze without her shoulders and face also being affected by the movement. Some underpainting between layers is often needed so things can move freely without revealing unillustrated areas.</em></p>
<p> <em> Luxs eyes were created in their entirety to avoid seams from appearing as her gaze shifted. When Suke went back to design Luxs eyeballs, he was amused by the overlay and sent an image to his teaman internal meme was born. </em></p>

    
    </div>


            </div>

            <div class="part slideshow">
                <div class="inner" style="width: 400px">
                        
                    
    

        
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-slideshow size-wide"
            >
                
        <div
            class="image-container"
            style="max-width: 400px;"
            data-images="[{&quot;url&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2016\/12\/layers_v3.gif&quot;,&quot;thumbnailUrl&quot;:&quot;http:\/\/nexus.leagueoflegends.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2016\/12\/layers_v3.gif&quot;,&quot;caption&quot;:&quot;Here&#039;s a handful of the many layers that exist within Lux&#039;s light form... and then there&#039;s that&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:400,&quot;height&quot;:700}]"
        >
            <div
                class="inner"
                style="padding-top: 175%;"
            >
                <button
                    type="button"
                    class="image-action action-open-slideshow"
                >
                    <img
                        class="image"
                        src="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/layers_v3.gif"
                        alt="Here's a handful of the many layers that exist within Lux's light form... and then there's that"
                    />
                </button>

                            </div>
        </div>

                    <div class="caption">Here's a handful of the many layers that exist within Lux's light form... and then there's that</div>
        
            
    </div>


                </div>
            </div>

        </div>
    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <h2>Making More by Doing Less</h2>
<p>When motion graphics artists Adam AdamKadamon Oliveira and Timothy BumsAreCool Weiser began working with Suke to add movement to the artwork, they werent sure how to bring Lux to life without detracting from the portraits intimacy. The previous approach to animating login screens by adding dramatic animation to a ready-to-brawl poses wouldnt work. The focus was shifted to subtle facial animations, background movements, and transitions.</p>

    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
                    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-youtube-video size-narrow"
            >
                <div
            class="inner"
            style="padding-top: 62.5%;"
        >
            <iframe class="video" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Qbsyemsaipk?iv_load_policy=3&amp;rel=0&amp;showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
        </div>
    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p style="text-align: center;"><em>By attaching levers to specific points of the image, artists can adjust Lux&#8217;s facial expressions</em></p>

    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p>It wasnt an easy adjustment. In the first attempts at adding motion, Luxs eyes seemed to scan the room rather lock onto the viewer. People consistently gave this feedback, I almost wish she didnt move at all, Adam says. The movements were so dramatic that it didnt feel like she was maintaining eye contact. Giving her eyes more subtle, natural twitches re-established the connection between Lux and onlookers while still adding life to her face.</p>

    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
                    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-youtube-video size-narrow"
            >
                <div
            class="inner"
            style="padding-top: 62.5%;"
        >
            <iframe class="video" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/S0SoCA3Qj4I?iv_load_policy=3&amp;rel=0&amp;showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
        </div>
    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
                    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-youtube-video size-narrow"
            >
                <div
            class="inner"
            style="padding-top: 62.5%;"
        >
            <iframe class="video" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/QRAIOy1V5Xw?iv_load_policy=3&amp;rel=0&amp;showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
        </div>
    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p style="text-align: center;"><em>Lux&#8217;s Eye Movements: Work-in-Progress and Final</em></p>

    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p>Tim and Adam also used motion to amplify the emotions captured in each image. Ripples of light softly reflect on to Luxs face in water form, while lava cascades dramatically through her hair in fire form. Magnifying hope in light form was a trickier, but Tim was still excited. I dont have many opportunities to be like, Make this cute as hell! Tim says. Light blooms, rainbow stuff, glitter in her hairI was going ham on it.</p>
<h2>When a Plan Comes Together</h2>
<p>Combining three unique images into one coherent, looping animation was tough. We wanted the transitions to look like theyre a part of Sukes art, like theyre just changing it over time, Tim says. Early versions of these transitions, especially for fire form, featured drastically contrasting colors in an aggressive overlay. It was definitely fire, but it didnt match with the more abstract, soft art style of the original. The transition felt natural once it mirrored the original color saturation levels and focal point.</p>

    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
                    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-youtube-video size-narrow"
            >
                <div
            class="inner"
            style="padding-top: 62.5%;"
        >
            <iframe class="video" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bKL1a5Snmv8?iv_load_policy=3&amp;rel=0&amp;showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
        </div>
    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
                    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-youtube-video size-narrow"
            >
                <div
            class="inner"
            style="padding-top: 62.5%;"
        >
            <iframe class="video" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/6tRrPdnT874?iv_load_policy=3&amp;rel=0&amp;showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
        </div>
    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p style="text-align: center;"><em>Transition to Fire Form: Work-in-Progress and Final</em></p>
<p>Besides literally connecting three disparate images, the transitions intensified the emotions embodied by each form. The heat of fire is so intense, for example, that the transitional overlay is powerful and dramatic, while the serenity of water warrants a smooth, rippling effect.</p>
<p>The instant Lux shifts from feeling the fury of fire to the tranquility of water can be seen in her eyes. Adam says, Theres this moment, less than a second, in fire form where Lux aggressively closes her eyes, like, ARGHH! Then, she lets go and finds peace. Similarly, when Lux opens her eyes after leaving water form, its to literally let in the light. This final addition made the transitions feel more than logistic: they represented Luxs ongoing search for her true nature.</p>

    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
                    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-youtube-video size-narrow"
            >
                <div
            class="inner"
            style="padding-top: 62.5%;"
        >
            <iframe class="video" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2gU_HpD0hWY?iv_load_policy=3&amp;rel=0&amp;showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
        </div>
    
    </div>


            
        
                                
    
        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-html"
            >
                <p style="text-align: center;"><em>The login&#8217;s video was created at the same time as the </em><i><a href="http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2016/11/ask-riot-the-one-about-pulsefire-ezreal/">music</a>, yet the transitions still aligned with the beat. &#8220;It was meant to be,&#8221; Tim jokes</i></p>

    
    </div>


            
            
    </div>



                
                    
                        <div
        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-sections"
            >

        class="component-content-section-base component-content-section-author"
        data-class="Author"    >

            c0.6-0.8,0.9-2,0.9-3.3c0-0.8-0.1-1.7-0.3-2.7c-0.2-0.9-0.5-1.8-1-2.7c-0.4-0.9-1-1.6-1.8-2.2c-0.6-0.5-1.5-0.8-2.4-0.8

        (function() {
                        var match = document.cookie.match('PVPNET_REGION=(.+?)(;|$)');
            var region = (match) ? match[1] : 'na';

                        match = document.cookie.match('PVPNET_LANG=(.+?)(;|$)');
            var lang = (match) ? match[1] : 'en_US';

            var regionToLanguageMap = {
                na: ['en_US'],
                euw: ['en_GB', 'de_DE', 'es_ES', 'fr_FR', 'it_IT'],
                eune: ['en_PL', 'pl_PL', 'el_GR', 'ro_RO', 'hu_HU', 'cs_CZ'],
                lan: ['es_MX'],
                las: ['es_AR'],
                br: ['pt_BR'],
                jp: ['ja_JP'],
                ru: ['ru_RU'],
                tr: ['tr_TR'],
                oce: ['en_AU'],
                kr: ['ko_KR'],
                pbe: ['en_BE']
            };

                        var regionLangs = regionToLanguageMap[region];
            if (regionLangs && regionLangs.indexOf(lang) < 0) {
                                lang = regionLangs[0];
            }

            var riotbarSrc = '//lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/riotbar/prod/latest/' + lang + '.js';

                        window.rg_force_language = lang;
            window.rg_force_manifest = '//ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/realms/' + region + '.js';

                        window.apolloCfg = {
                services: {
                    comment: {
                        uri: 'http:\/\/apollo.leagueoflegends.com\/apollo\/'
                    }
                }
            };

            var runNexus = function() {
                require(['nexus'], function(nexus) {
                    nexus();
                });
            }

                        require([riotbarSrc], runNexus, runNexus);
        })();

                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {

                  media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 19:57:59 --></html>

            var jqueryTimeoutSetup = function() {

            };

            var postJquerySetup = function() {
                if(typeof $ !== 'undefined' && typeof CardDeVideos !== 'undefined') {
                    var initCard = function() {

class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">canal das pedrinhas</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 11 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ap/amapa/amapa-tv/videos/t/edicoes/v/em-macapa-jovem-morre-enquanto-fazia-a-troca-da-helice-de-uma-embarcacao/5752142/" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Jovem morre eletrocutado ao fazer troca de hélice em barco</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Elenilson dos Anjos, de 21 anos, era mecânico do barco. Ele teria sofrido um choque ao encostar em fio elétrico, diz PM. 
</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="8"><div><div class="feed-post type-basico"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ap/amapa/noticia/2017/03/amapaense-busca-filha-levada-sem-autorizacao-pelo-pai-para-roraima.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover " style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" srcSet="http://s2.glbimg.com/qM7jYp6Sxqj8HbjySd44d8uZSe8=/0x0:620x465/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/24/meinina_rr.jpg 1x,http://s2.glbimg.com/LM7lm9qzrBvUxSXBD8_9NmkaKhI=/0x0:620x465/810x456/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/24/meinina_rr.jpg 1.5x,http://s2.glbimg.com/T_FU3Tr2X-47EOEHBVSfu32YQrA=/0x0:620x465/1080x608/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/24/meinina_rr.jpg 2x" src="http://s2.glbimg.com/qM7jYp6Sxqj8HbjySd44d8uZSe8=/0x0:620x465/540x304/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/jo/g1/f/original/2017/03/24/meinina_rr.jpg"></picture></div></a></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">sumida há 3 meses</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 13 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/ap/amapa/noticia/2017/03/amapaense-busca-filha-levada-sem-autorizacao-pelo-pai-para-roraima.html" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Amapaense busca filha levada sem autorização pelo pai para Roraima</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Pai da criança foi achado morto e menina está com madrasta em Boa vista.
Criança foi levada em dezembro de 2016.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="9"><div><div class="feed-post        class="link-plantao">últimas notícias</a></div></div><div id="glb-rodape" class="widget_rodape_container"><div class="footer product-color" data-ga-area="footer"><div class="grid-12 container row clearfix" data-ga-marker="links"><div class="column"><ul class="first-line"><li class="ib middle"><a class="logo" href="//globo.com/" title="Globo.com">Globo.com</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//g1.globo.com/">g1</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//globoesporte.globo.com/">globoesporte</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//gshow.globo.com/">gshow</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//famosos.globo.com/">famosos & etc</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//globotv.globo.com/">vídeos</a></li><li class="ib middle"><a href="//www.globo.com/todos-os-sites.html">todos os sites</a></li><li class="pushed ib middle"><span>Globo Notícias</span></li></ul><span class="pull-left">&copy;                   media="screen"
                  href="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/css/barra-globocom.min.css"
                  type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript">(function(){glb.barra={exibeAssineJa:true,exibeCentral:true,iframe:false};var s=document.createElement("script");s.type="text/javascript";s.async=true;s.charset="utf-8";s.src="//s.glbimg.com/gl/ba/js/barra-globocom.min.js";var ss=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];ss.parentNode.insertBefore(s,ss);})();</script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
    'use strict';

    var timerId ; // Current timer handler
    var refreshTime = 300000; // 1000*60*5
    var graceTimerStep = 10000; // 1000*10

    var isMobile = function() {
        return ($('#regua-navegacao:visible').length > 0);
    };

    var preparePlayer = function(player) {

        var refreshPageWithTimeout = function() {

            console.log('Trying to refresh on' + graceTimerStep + ' ms.');
            setTimeout(function() {
                    if (!player.isPlaying()) {
                        refreshPage();
                    }
                    console.log('Watching a video. Refresh the page later');
                }, graceTimerStep);
        };

        var playerComplete = player.complete;
        if ($.isFunction(playerComplete)) {
            player.complete = function() {
                playerComplete.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPage();
            };
        }
        else {
            player.complete = refreshPage;
        }

        var playerOnPause = player.onPause;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnPause)) {
            player.onPause = function() {
                playerOnPause.apply(this, arguments);
                refreshPageWithTimeout(player);
            };
        }
        else {
            player.onPause = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }

        var playerOnStop = player.onStop;
        if ($.isFunction(playerOnStop)) {
            player.onStop = function() {
              playerOnStop.apply(this, arguments);
              refreshPageWithTimeout();
          };
        }
        else {
            player.onStop = refreshPageWithTimeout;
        }
    };

    var refreshPage = function() {
        if (!isMobile()) {
            console.log('Refreshing now');
            window.location.reload();
        }
        else {
            console.log('Is mobile: Not reloading the page.');
        }
    };

    var checkForVideoPlaying = function() {

        console.log('Timeout: Refreshing the page at any moment.');

        clearTimeout(timerId); // clear timer

        var isVideoPlaying = false;

        $.each(WM.PlayerManager, function(index, player) {
            isVideoPlaying = isVideoPlaying || player.isPlaying();
            if (player.isPlaying()) {
                preparePlayer(player);
            }
        });

        if (!isVideoPlaying) {
            refreshPage();
        }

    };

    var startTimer = function() {
        timerId = setTimeout(checkForVideoPlaying, refreshTime);
    };

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if (!isMobile() && window.location.hash != '#debug' ) {
            console.log('Time Started: ' + refreshTime + ' ms until Refresh.');
            startTimer();
        }
    });

})();
</script></body><!-- Página gerada em 25/03/2017 21:11:41 --></html>
